title: List of Postgres regular extensions. see https://www.postgresql.org/docs/current/contrib.html

anyOf.title: dict_int
anyOf.description: text search dictionary template for integers

anyOf.title: file_fdw
anyOf.description: foreign-data wrapper for flat file access

anyOf.title: dblink
anyOf.description: connect to other PostgreSQL databases from within a database

anyOf.title: uuid-ossp
anyOf.description: generate universally unique identifiers (UUIDs)

anyOf.title: adminpack
anyOf.description: administrative functions for PostgreSQL

anyOf.title: pgcrypto
anyOf.description: cryptographic functions

anyOf.title: lo
anyOf.description: Large Object maintenance

anyOf.title: citext
anyOf.description: data type for case-insensitive character strings

anyOf.title: hstore
anyOf.description: data type for storing sets of (key, value) pairs

anyOf.title: sslinfo
anyOf.description: information about SSL certificates

anyOf.title: insert_username
anyOf.description: functions for tracking who changed a table

anyOf.title: seg
anyOf.description: data type for representing line segments or floating-point intervals

anyOf.title: postgres_fdw
anyOf.description: foreign-data wrapper for remote PostgreSQL servers

anyOf.title: pg_stat_statements
anyOf.description: track planning and execution statistics of all SQL statements executed

anyOf.title: intarray
anyOf.description: functions, operators, and index support for 1-D arrays of integers

anyOf.title: pageinspect
anyOf.description: inspect the contents of database pages at a low level

anyOf.title: pg_trgm
anyOf.description: text similarity measurement and index searching based on trigrams

anyOf.title: cube
anyOf.description: data type for multidimensional cubes

anyOf.title: amcheck
anyOf.description: functions for verifying relation integrity

anyOf.title: tsm_system_rows
anyOf.description: TABLESAMPLE method which accepts number of rows as a limit

anyOf.title: fuzzystrmatch
anyOf.description: determine similarities and distance between strings

anyOf.title: pg_freespacemap
anyOf.description: examine the free space map (FSM)

anyOf.title: pg_surgery
anyOf.description: extension to perform surgery on a damaged relation

anyOf.title: pgrowlocks
anyOf.description: show row-level locking information

anyOf.title: ltree
anyOf.description: data type for hierarchical tree-like structures

anyOf.title: earthdistance
anyOf.description: calculate great-circle distances on the surface of the Earth

anyOf.title: old_snapshot
anyOf.description: utilities in support of old_snapshot_threshold

anyOf.title: unaccent
anyOf.description: text search dictionary that removes accents

anyOf.title: autoinc
anyOf.description: functions for autoincrementing fields

anyOf.title: pg_buffercache
anyOf.description: examine the shared buffer cache

anyOf.title: pgstattuple
anyOf.description: show tuple-level statistics

anyOf.title: plpgsql
anyOf.description: PL/pgSQL procedural language

anyOf.title: isn
anyOf.description: data types for international product numbering standards

anyOf.title: dict_xsyn
anyOf.description: text search dictionary template for extended synonym processing

anyOf.title: refint
anyOf.description: functions for implementing referential integrity (obsolete)

anyOf.title: tsm_system_time
anyOf.description: TABLESAMPLE method which accepts time in milliseconds as a limit

anyOf.title: pg_prewarm
anyOf.description: prewarm relation data

anyOf.title: intagg
anyOf.description: integer aggregator and enumerator (obsolete)

anyOf.title: btree_gin
anyOf.description: support for indexing common datatypes in GIN

anyOf.title: tcn
anyOf.description: Triggered change notifications

anyOf.title: tablefunc
anyOf.description: functions that manipulate whole tables, including crosstab

anyOf.title: pg_visibility
anyOf.description: examine the visibility map (VM) and page-level visibility info

anyOf.title: btree_gist
anyOf.description: support for indexing common datatypes in GiST

anyOf.title: moddatetime
anyOf.description: functions for tracking last modification time

anyOf.title: bloom
anyOf.description: bloom access method - signature file based index

anyOf.title: xml2
anyOf.description: XPath querying and XSLT

anyOf.title: pgaudit
anyOf.description: provides auditing functionality

anyOf.title: pgrouting
anyOf.description: pgRouting Extension

anyOf.description: PostGIS geometry and geography spatial types and functions

anyOf.description: PostGIS SFCGAL functions

anyOf.description: Address Standardizer US dataset example

anyOf.description: PostGIS topology spatial types and functions

anyOf.description: PostGIS raster types and functions
